engagement_grid._comment: G1: Who was engaged and how

engagement_descriptions.barriers_people_who_use_drugs: Finding the right pathways to populations we don't serve on a daily basis (ages 20-55) has been difficult, but we have established a working group to move that work forward.
engagement_descriptions.barriers_people_in_recovery: Finding the right pathways to populations we don't serve on a daily basis (ages 20-55) has been difficult, but we have established a working group to move that work forward.

behavioral_health_assessment._comment: G3: How behavioral health needs were assessed
behavioral_health_assessment.admin_data_sources: We conducted a Community Health Improvement Program (CHIP) that has provided a baseline level of data to move this work forward.
behavioral_health_assessment.other_methods: A number of surveys and focus groups were conducted through the CHIP process and we also have an Opioid Working Group made up of clinicians and community support professionals.
behavioral_health_assessment.barriers: Reaching populations we do not serve in the school district or the senior center has historically been a challenge, especially in the arena of mental health service and support, we will continue to move this work forward.

planning.process: Our municipality conducted its own planning process.

treatment.barriers: We have established a working group and now intend to move major program work forward.

recovery_support.barriers: We have established a working group and now intend to move major program work forward.
